jobs.title: Frontend Developer
list: Development of the frontend part of a large online store using the Nuxt framework

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: After college, I took up the study of web development, created websites for my friends, was fond of 3D modeling and from time to time I managed to take small orders.

about: I am a frontend developer with two years of commercial experience. My attention is always focused on details such as accessibility, responsiveness, and product optimization. I have extensive knowledge in HTML, CSS, and TS/JS, as well as experience with various frameworks and libraries such as Nuxt, Vue.js, and React.
In addition to my core skills, I have significant experience working with Figma and Photoshop. I also have commercial experience in developing layouts for Wordpress.

header.name: David Aganov
header.subtitle: Hello, my name is
header.description: Iâ€™m frontend developer. I like to learn new technologies and try new things in every possible way.

about.title: About me
description: I have been interested in web development since 2016 when I started learning it through free online courses and YouTube videos. Since then, I have been constantly learning and improving my skills.

Finally, I was lucky enough to turn my hobby into a career and become a frontend developer at a company that develops mobile games and other projects. Here, I work on developing products using the <strong>Nuxt.js</strong framework and creating landing pages.

During the year and a half I have spent at this company, I have gained a lot of new knowledge and skills. Also, I underwent training in courses on React and React Native development, which helped me expand my toolset.
I believe that continuous learning is a key factor in the development of a web developer, and I continue to work diligently to expand my knowledge and skills in this field.

projects.title: Projects
projects.errorSubtitle: Perhaps you should check for github?

comforty.short_description: Online store for the sale of furniture
description: In this project, I explored the use of the Composition API and TypeScript in Vue.
One of the interesting tasks was to integrate Firebase as an API and create pagination and product filtering functionality using queries to Firebase.
Landing created using React and TypeScript. On this project I practiced writing unit tests in Jest.
I decided to write the carousel component myself and came up with animations for menus and buttons.
